html:
Dec 7 (Reuters) - DEVOTEAM SA DVTM.PA:: *ENTERS A STRATEGIC COLLABORATION WITH AWS TO FOCUS ON ACCELERATING EMEA CUSTOMERS CLOUD ADOPTION *DEVOTEAM A CLOUD WILL HIRE 1500 CLOUD EXPERTS BY 2025 *THIS 4-YEAR PROGRAM GIVES DEVOTEAM NEW AMBITIONS *THE AMBITION IS TO TRIPLE THE AMOUNT OF DEVOTEAM CUSTOMERS' CLOUD PROJECTS IMPLEMENTED OVER THE NEXT 4 YEARS *DEVOTEAM A CLOUD PLANS TO FIRST FOCUS ON FRANCE, GERMANY, UK, SWEDEN, PORTUGAL AND BELGIUM


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 07-DEC-202113:05:00 GMT
